code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function BookingForm(props){const[ticketQuantity,setTicketQuantity]=useState(0);const handleSubmit=event=>{event.preventDefault();axios.post(`http://localhost:8000/api/bookings/`,{event:props.event.id,user:props.user.id,ticket_quantity:ticketQuantity}).then(response=>{console.log(response.data);}).catch(error=>{console.error(error);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Ticket quantity:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:ticketQuantity,onChange:event=>setTicketQuantity(event.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Purchase Tickets"})]});}export default BookingForm;
